Song.title: All Creatures Of Our God And King
Song.copyright: Words by Saint Francis of Assisi Music by William Henry Draper Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D]All creatures [Bm]of our [G]God and [A]King [D]Lift up your [Bm]voice and [G]with us [A]sing [Bm]Alle[G]lu[A]ia! [Bm]Alle[G]lu[A]ia! [D]Thou burning [Bm]sun with [G]golden [A]beam, [D]Thou silver [Bm]moon with [G]softer [A]gleam
Chorus: [Em]O [A]praise [D]Him! [Em]O [A]praise [D]Him! [Bm]Alle[G]lu[A]ia! [Bm]Alle[G]lu[A]ia! [Em]Alle[A]lu[D]ia!
Verse 2: [D]Thou rushing [Bm]wind that [G]art so [A]strong [D]Ye clouds that [Bm]sail in [G]Heaven [A]along, [Bm]O [G]praise [A]Him! [Bm]Alle[G]lu[A]ia! [D]Thou rushing [Bm]morn in [G]praise rej[A]oice, [D]Ye lights of [Bm]evening [G]find a [A]voice
Verse 3: [D]All ye [Bm]men of [G]tender [A]heart [D]Forgiving [Bm]others [G]take your [A]part [Bm]O [G]sing [A]ye! [Bm]Alle[G]lu[A]ia! [D]Ye who long [Bm]pain and [G]sorrow [A]bear [D]Praise God and [Bm]on Him [G]cast your [A]care
Verse 4: [D]Let all things [Bm]their Cre[G]ator [A]bless [D]And worship [Bm]Him in [G]humble[A]ness [Bm]O [G]praise [A]Him! [Bm]Alle[G]lu[A]ia! [D]Praise, praise the [Bm]Father, [G]praise the [A]Son [D]And praise the [Bm]Spirit, [G]Three in [A]One
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 all creatures of our god and king lift up your voice and with us sing alleluia alleluia thou burning sun with golden beam thou silver moon with softer gleam chorus o praise him o praise him alleluia alleluia alleluia verse 2 thou rushing wind that art so strong ye clouds that sail in heaven along o praise him alleluia thou rushing morn in praise rejoice ye lights of evening find a voice verse 3 all ye men of tender heart forgiving others take your part o sing ye alleluia ye who long pain and sorrow bear praise god and on him cast your care verse 4 let all things their creator bless and worship him in humbleness o praise him alleluia praise praise the father praise the son and praise the spirit three in one
